item.title: Dead deer under A46 bridge on A417, 19th August
item.description:
Dead deer under A46 bridge on A417 heading east towards Crickley Hill / Birdlip. Was seen going home from work on Monday 18th. https://what3words.com/pricing.giraffes.overlook
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large distracting road sign, 19th August
item.description:
A large wooden placard has been erected on the roadside, right on a bend by the bridge. It’s a dangerous distraction for drivers — I’ve already seen a near-collision where one car drifted wide while another came down the hill. The sign shouldn’t be in such a prominent position and definitely not as a permanent fixture.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Curb stone sank to road level, 19th August
item.description:
Curb stone has sank to road level needs attention before a hazard happens as the road is narrow be aware cars park on the pavement ad not choice so you may need to get a car moved for the repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Ryeworth Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Its getting deeper as days go by its a huge dip accross the, 19th August
item.description:
Its getting deeper every day cars are scrapping the road its that deep to me its an emergency before cars get seriously damaged or even cause an accident its the whole width of the road it has been repaired before but not good enough for it to return again so quickly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Ryeworth Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
